package.name: Eclipse
package.description: An Adium chat style theme from the Adiumxtras site.
package.long:
Transparency abound, Eclipse can stand in front of anything. It's fun, subtle, beautiful, utterly kick-ass, and any other adjective you want it to be. Now with more variants and cleaner code.
This theme is available at http://www.adiumxtras.com/index.php?a=xtras&xtra_id=374
